blog.name: homaree
blog.title: bishin got purified 2k19
blog.description: Monoma married me and there's nothing you can do about it

summary: day 3 - personality/clothes swap i love the context of this sm,,,, i took it a step further where they just completely swap...
caption:
day 3 - personality/clothes swap

i love the context of this sm,,,, i took it a step further where they just completely swap roles too! also art by me for once, though it’s a messy edit,,,

I hope everyone’ll have a wonderful Christmas! I still have to wait like 6 hours as I’m in England but for those living in places where it’s Christmas very soon, have fun! <3

blog.name: leilani-popplio
blog.title: Siren Child
blog.description: A mysterious tribal Popplio with her own story to tell. Asks now open.

summary: [[MORE]] “I haven’t seen my family since we saw the monsters from the hole in the sky, so I’m here completely alone. But no...
body:
“I haven’t seen my family since we saw the monsters from the hole in the sky, so I’m here completely alone. But no Mother also means I could do anything I wanted. I could stay up way past my bed time or… or… eat all the sweets in that lodge. Or hide in that pretty tree with all the lights and throw those balls hanging from them at others. Mother can’t say no if Mother’s not here, right?”

“Being able to do whatever they want without being punished sounds like something a lot of kids would love. Even from my tribe, I know the only thing stopping some of the other Popplio from doing things they weren’t supposed to do was their mothers. Some even did bad things sometimes even after being told they couldn’t. And, Santa, if you judge other kids, then I’m sure you’ve seen the same thing, or kids who would do bad things if they had no one to tell them they couldn’t. But I don’t, because it’s mean, and I don’t like hurting others or taking things I don’t need. Seeing others being sad doesn’t make me happy.”

“And speaking of sweets… 

“I bet you get hungry from judging whether or not others are naughty or nice. I’d be happy to let you have some cookies! Sorry I don’t have anything to drink, though. I didn’t think to get anything.”

(sorry this is late, and sorry it’s a bit long)

@anonyorb @askadragonite @pokecommunityevents

blog.name: lotorinhighheels
blog.title: Purple Elf Asthetic
blog.description: Icon done by victoriagreenleaf thank you so much! Side blog for Voltron and now will also be my dumping grounds for The Dragon Prince too. I made so it didn't take over my main blog. I dabble in alot of ships and Stan Lotor Keith Aavaros and Runaan alot. There will be spoilers. I change my blog title and images sometimes. So be on the lookout for that.

body:
Voltron Pokemon teams

All of them have evee related things and legendaries for perfectly valid reasons and…not at all cuz I’m biased…ya…

Lotor

(Espeon,Houndoom,Aegislash,Empoleon,Gardevoir,Xerneas)

All of his Pokemon are a mix of 2 types because I like to be obvious..

The exceptions are Espeon and Xerneas.

Espeon because of aesthetic reasons and he likes cats. But also Espeon levels up through friendship and well he could really use a friend. And I feel like Lotor would like psychic abilities to defend against his Haggar’s. Xerneas because he, I think would be interested in the Pokemon of life that intervenes when natural order is disrupted. Maybe that Pokemon could solve his parents quintessence poisoning? Or at least he might think it would be worth a try.

There are a lot of steel and psychic dark and fairy. Steel because Lotor was good at creating mech suits. Psychic dark and fairy because feel most similar to magic in general and Lotor is interested in magic so…ya.

Keith

(Flareon, Arcanine, Lucario, Absol, Tyranitar,Solageo)

I considered giving him Umbreon because he does become black lions paladin in the end. But Shiro was the one who always had that connection from the beginning he was like the most in sync with Black. And his connection to Black was more explored.  Plus I feel like fire suits Keith more than anyone else.

But I do think Keith like Lotor wants and needs those close friendships so I put in Lucario who also needs friendship to level up.

I see Keith as like a animal lover so all his pokemon resemble animals in some way. Especially furry animals that you can cuddle. I also gave him Solageo cuz I feel like Keith would take care of Cosmog just cuz and then he’d be like wtf when cosmog became a legendary. And it’s funnier that way.

Shiro

(Umbreon, Mightyena, Gallade, Blissey, Type: Null, Lugia)

One of these not like the others lol. Honestly I feel like Shiro could use a Pokemon that could heal him the boy gets fucked up alot. So I already mostly explained why Umbreon. Because the connection with the black Lion was such a big thing I wanted to give him a Pokemon where that emotional bond is important. And Umbreon over something else because were aesthetic. Shiro I feel like he’d get a lot of loyal Pokemon. I think he’d appreciate it and he does inspire loyalty in a lot of people. I think he has kinda this psychic connection with a lot of things/ people in series. It’s not the biggest focus of his character but it’s a important aspect.

Type:Null is a result of experimentation so I feel like they’d be kindred spirits. And Lugia because honestly I feel like they’d get along temperamentally.

Lance

(Vaporeon, Gyrados, Primarina, Staraptor, Togekiss, Mew)

A lot of water type pokemon cuz of his first lion. I’ll be honest I never thought red much suited Lance. It did I think in terms of like loyalty to the black palladin. But other than that not really. I thought blue was better for him. And I think water is a good representation for him. He is generally pretty adaptable and capable of being flexible. But he can be stubborn and put his foot down when needed. Also earth is kinda the water planet and he felt I think the most homesick. I wanted him to have a flying pokemon because he did want to be a pilot and very much enjoyed being one. I think he just liked flying in general. He does have a connection to altean magic through Allura at the end and Altean magic the way Allura does it reminds me most of fairy type. But also I thought he should have at least 1 psychic pokemon since he was the first one to get that psychic connection thing with the real Shiro. Mew is also a playful troll so I think they’d get along great much like Shiro and Lugia.

Hunk

(Evee, Aggron, Electivire, Flygon, Dragonite, Regirock)

I considered giving him Leafeon but Green lion’s paladin felt more appropriate to give that too. Plus I think Evee is a good match for Hunk he pretty down to earth, reliable friendly, and sweet. The least dramatic and least competitive. They’d get along. Plus Evee is so cute I had to give Evee to someone. Hunk is pretty much the team tank and he rather likes being a tank and getting gear that would help with that. So I think he’d like Pokemon who can be tanks( and Pokemon that appear tank like) makes sense for him. He does like engineering so I felt like he needed at least one electric Pokemon. But I think apart from Lance he was the most homesick. So I felt he should have at least a few Pokemon that felt earthy. Like Rock and ground types. But I think he needed at least one that looked pretty friendly and huggable, since he is so friendly and huggable, so Dragonite.

Pidge

(Leafeon, Porygon-Z, Nihilego, Rotom, Meganezone, Palkia)

I gave Pidge Leafeon as her tie to the nature side of things but Pidge is the ultimate space and tech nerd. So I had to make her legendary something related to space. And she needed Pokemon that would resemble like robots in some way. I think she’d have the most number of weird looking pokemon. She’d think they looked cute too. Also at least 1 electric pokemon because of her interest in tech.

Allura

(Sylveon, Azumaril, Mawile, Mimikyu, Frosslass, Cresselia)

A bunch of fairy pokemon here. Like I said Allura’s magic feels (to me) most fairy type like than any other type. Plus her with a Sylveon is just cute they match too.

Azumarill I wanted to especially put in because of her piloting blue. I had mixed feelings on all the other paladin switches but I think Allura made a great palladin for Blue even if I preferred Lance as Blue’s Palladin.

I also put in a couple ghost pokemon because I feel like she’d be interested in ghosts. I also wanted something a little creepy/gothic for Allura. Pink is basically the equivalent for black for them since it is associated with the dead.

Cresselia I wish I could put into words why it makes sense for Allura but I can’t somehow it just fits in my mind. I know Cresselia is psychic but I feel like if  Fairy had been a type when her game came out she would be Fairy.

This was fun. Maybe I’ll do other characters some day.

Also at least 1 electric pokemon because of her interest in tech.

Allura

(Sylveon, Azumaril, Mawile, Mimikyu, Frosslass, Cresselia)

A bunch of fairy pokemon here. Like I said Allura’s magic feels (to me) most fairy type like than any other type. Plus her with a Sylveon is just cute they match too.

Azumarill I wanted to especially put in because of her piloting blue. I had mixed feelings on all the other paladin switches but I think Allura made a great palladin for Blue even if I preferred Lance as Blue’s Palladin.

I also put in a couple ghost pokemon because I feel like she’d be interested in ghosts. I also wanted something a little creepy/gothic for Allura. Pink is basically the equivalent for black for them since it is associated with the dead.

Cresselia I wish I could put into words why it makes sense for Allura but I can’t somehow it just fits in my mind. I know Cresselia is psychic but I feel like if  Fairy had been a type when her game came out she would be Fairy.

This was fun. Maybe I’ll do other characters some day.
trail.content:
Voltron Pokemon teams

All of them have evee related things and legendaries for perfectly valid reasons and…not at all cuz I’m biased…ya…

Lotor

(Espeon,Houndoom,Aegislash,Empoleon,Gardevoir,Xerneas)

All of his Pokemon are a mix of 2 types because I like to be obvious..

The exceptions are Espeon and Xerneas.

Espeon because of aesthetic reasons and he likes cats. But also Espeon levels up through friendship and well he could really use a friend. And I feel like Lotor would like psychic abilities to defend against his Haggar’s. Xerneas because he, I think would be interested in the Pokemon of life that intervenes when natural order is disrupted. Maybe that Pokemon could solve his parents quintessence poisoning? Or at least he might think it would be worth a try.

There are a lot of steel and psychic dark and fairy. Steel because Lotor was good at creating mech suits. Psychic dark and fairy because feel most similar to magic in general and Lotor is interested in magic so…ya.

Keith

(Flareon, Arcanine, Lucario, Absol, Tyranitar,Solageo)

I considered giving him Umbreon because he does become black lions paladin in the end. But Shiro was the one who always had that connection from the beginning he was like the most in sync with Black. And his connection to Black was more explored.  Plus I feel like fire suits Keith more than anyone else.

But I do think Keith like Lotor wants and needs those close friendships so I put in Lucario who also needs friendship to level up.

I see Keith as like a animal lover so all his pokemon resemble animals in some way. Especially furry animals that you can cuddle. I also gave him Solageo cuz I feel like Keith would take care of Cosmog just cuz and then he’d be like wtf when cosmog became a legendary. And it’s funnier that way.

Shiro

(Umbreon, Mightyena, Gallade, Blissey, Type: Null, Lugia)

One of these not like the others lol. Honestly I feel like Shiro could use a Pokemon that could heal him the boy gets fucked up alot. So I already mostly explained why Umbreon. Because the connection with the black Lion was such a big thing I wanted to give him a Pokemon where that emotional bond is important. And Umbreon over something else because were aesthetic. Shiro I feel like he’d get a lot of loyal Pokemon. I think he’d appreciate it and he does inspire loyalty in a lot of people. I think he has kinda this psychic connection with a lot of things/ people in series. It’s not the biggest focus of his character but it’s a important aspect.

Type:Null is a result of experimentation so I feel like they’d be kindred spirits. And Lugia because honestly I feel like they’d get along temperamentally.

Lance

(Vaporeon, Gyrados, Primarina, Staraptor, Togekiss, Mew)

A lot of water type pokemon cuz of his first lion. I’ll be honest I never thought red much suited Lance. It did I think in terms of like loyalty to the black palladin. But other than that not really. I thought blue was better for him. And I think water is a good representation for him. He is generally pretty adaptable and capable of being flexible. But he can be stubborn and put his foot down when needed. Also earth is kinda the water planet and he felt I think the most homesick. I wanted him to have a flying pokemon because he did want to be a pilot and very much enjoyed being one. I think he just liked flying in general. He does have a connection to altean magic through Allura at the end and Altean magic the way Allura does it reminds me most of fairy type. But also I thought he should have at least 1 psychic pokemon since he was the first one to get that psychic connection thing with the real Shiro. Mew is also a playful troll so I think they’d get along great much like Shiro and Lugia.

Hunk

(Evee, Aggron, Electivire, Flygon, Dragonite, Regirock)

I considered giving him Leafeon but Green lion’s paladin felt more appropriate to give that too. Plus I think Evee is a good match for Hunk he pretty down to earth, reliable friendly, and sweet. The least dramatic and least competitive. They’d get along. Plus Evee is so cute I had to give Evee to someone. Hunk is pretty much the team tank and he rather likes being a tank and getting gear that would help with that. So I think he’d like Pokemon who can be tanks( and Pokemon that appear tank like) makes sense for him. He does like engineering so I felt like he needed at least one electric Pokemon. But I think apart from Lance he was the most homesick. So I felt he should have at least a few Pokemon that felt earthy. Like Rock and ground types. But I think he needed at least one that looked pretty friendly and huggable, since he is so friendly and huggable, so Dragonite.

Pidge

(Leafeon, Porygon-Z, Nihilego, Rotom, Meganezone, Palkia)

I gave Pidge Leafeon as her tie to the nature side of things but Pidge is the ultimate space and tech nerd. So I had to make her legendary something related to space. And she needed Pokemon that would resemble like robots in some way. I think she’d have the most number of weird looking pokemon. She’d think they looked cute too. Also at least 1 electric pokemon because of her interest in tech.

Allura

(Sylveon, Azumaril, Mawile, Mimikyu, Frosslass, Cresselia)

A bunch of fairy pokemon here. Like I said Allura’s magic feels (to me) most fairy type like than any other type. Plus her with a Sylveon is just cute they match too.

Azumarill I wanted to especially put in because of her piloting blue. I had mixed feelings on all the other paladin switches but I think Allura made a great palladin for Blue even if I preferred Lance as Blue’s Palladin.

I also put in a couple ghost pokemon because I feel like she’d be interested in ghosts. I also wanted something a little creepy/gothic for Allura. Pink is basically the equivalent for black for them since it is associated with the dead.

Cresselia I wish I could put into words why it makes sense for Allura but I can’t somehow it just fits in my mind. I know Cresselia is psychic but I feel like if  Fairy had been a type when her game came out she would be Fairy.

This was fun. Maybe I’ll do other characters some day.

blog.name: friendsafariserver
blog.title: Friend Safari!
blog.description:
Friend Safari is a SFW, OC-friendly, paragraph-style roleplay server for main series Pokémon games. From Kanto to Alola, the whole Pokémon world is your Cloyster! Members of this server are allowed a total of four played characters, with at least one required to be canonical.

The server is run by a team of five mods who you can learn more about via the mods page. We cultivate an easygoing and open atmosphere, with member comfort and happiness being our top priority.

All of the links are in the drop down menu under Rowlet, labeled Pokémon! Hovering over each Pokémon will tell you what page they link to!

summary: Welcome to the Friend Safari! Friend Safari is a Discord-based paragraph roleplay group. With channels for every region,...
body:
Welcome to the Friend Safari!

Friend Safari is a Discord-based paragraph roleplay group. With channels for every region, multiple modes for character interactions, and plenty of in-character events, ours is an active and welcoming group always looking for new members! To learn more about our server, head over to our rules!

Reblog this ad, stop by our blog and check us out!

tags: you deserve a nice long rest
summary:
Game Freak Should Give Pokémon a Longer Rest Between New Titles 

Game Freak has stayed true to the original concept with new...
caption:
Game Freak Should Give Pokémon a Longer Rest Between New Titles

Game Freak has stayed true to the original concept with new adjustments here and there over time. While this has worked out so far, since its move to the 3DS and now Switch there are a few things that have felt a bit lacking in Pokémon despite still being mostly enjoyable. Although Game Freak may be known entirely for Pokémon at this point, it could greatly benefit from having a break for a bit. 

Read some more!

https://www.hardcoregamer.com/2018/12/23/game-freak-should-give-pokemon-a-longer-rest-between-new-titles/321007/
